fields.name: Message
fields.description: The message describing why the Data Lake Analytics account name is not available, if nameAvailable is false.

fields.name: NameAvailable
fields.description: The Boolean value of true or false to indicate whether the Data Lake Analytics account name is available or not.

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the Data Lake Analytics account name is not available, if nameAvailable is false.
